code: @Override public Statement apply(Statement base, Description description) {     try {         DockerClientFactory.instance().client().     } catch (Throwable ex) {         return new SkipStatement().     }     this.container = this.containerFactory.get().     return ((FailureDetectingExternalResource) this.container).apply(base, description). }
@Override public void evaluate() {     throw new AssumptionViolatedException("Could not find a valid Docker environment."). }
